description:
⚡ Principal RWE Data Scientist

   Series C, Startup

  ️ USA Remote

   Competitive Base + Significant Equity + Bonus

Interested in joining a company that are revolutionizing the Real World Evidence Space?

They are building a world-class Data Science team to accelerate the use of RWD for clinical trials.

     Responsibilities:
• Work with client and internal teams to advance approaches that best utilize real world data (RWD) and technologies and provide solutions to clients
• Understand client goals, providing scientific and methodological direction and translate clinical questions into practical data science solutions
• Develop deep understanding for oncology patient journeys and analyze, visualize, interpret, and contextualize results for and with clients
• Convert complex longitudinal data into data frames ready for bespoke analysis and/or machine learning, iterating repeatedly with clinical and client stakeholders
• Design and implement data science solutions to find clinical and genomic biomarkers of response to oncology drugs such as immune checkpoint inhibitors, TKIs, ADTs etc. in diseases like lung, prostate and bladder cancers

     Requirements:
• 4+ years' experience in client-facing role and comfortable to run and own a client workstream
• 5+ years hands-on experience in analyzing real world data
• 4+ years’ experience in applying advanced machine learning (random forest, XGBoost etc.) and/ or deep learning and/or causal inference on healthcare related problems
• Experience working with genomics data
• PhD in a STEM field or equivalent experience, with training in biology, biomedicine, statistics, bioinformatics, computational biology, data science
• Subject matter expertise (oncology or RWD)
• Strong programming skills in Python and knowledge of SQL
• Experience with basic modeling (regression, classification, survival analysis etc.)

⭐ Benefits
• Opportunity to work on challenging, that will be immediately deployed to accelerate the discovery of new therapeutics
• Extremely competitive salary
• Significant Equity
• Medical, dental, and vision insurance
• Highly Competitive Base + Bonus
• Maternity/Paternity leave

   Interested in applying? Please click on the ‘Easy Apply’ button

⚡ Storm3 is a HealthTech recruitment firm with clients across London, Europe and North America. To discuss open opportunities or career options, please visit our website www.storm3.com and follow the Storm3 Linked In page for the latest jobs and intel.
